name: Rai, Archmage
effect: Rai Lineage (Rai, Archmage must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.) Inherited Effect: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card each turn, put an enlighten counter on your champion. (When this champion levels up, the new champion gains this ability.)
effect_raw:
Rai Lineage (Rai, Archmage must be leveled from a previous level "Rai" champion.)
Inherited Effect: Whenever you activate your first Mage action card each turn, put an enlighten counter on your champion. (When this champion levels up, the new champion gains this ability.)
